name: suksma - god might as well - unc fs m roams
description: suksma - god might as well - unc fs m roams
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=3
PSVERSION_WARP=3
PSVERSION_COMP=3
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2.001
fDecay=0.900
fVideoEchoZoom=2.000

nVideoEchoOrientation=0
nWaveMode=7
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0

bDarken=0

fWaveScale=1.000
fWaveSmoothing=0.000
fWaveParam=0.000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.500
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000

fZoomExponent=1.00170
fShader=1.000

rot=0.00000
cx=0.440
cy=0.500
dx=0.00000
dy=0.00000
warp=0.01000
sx=1.00000
sy=1.00000

wave_g=0.500
wave_b=0.500
wave_x=0.500
wave_y=0.500

ob_g=0.000

ib_g=0.500

nMotionVectorsY=0.000

b1n=0.000

b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=0
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0

wavecode_0_bUseDots=0

wavecode_0_r=1.000
wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_per_point1=x=sample+0.1*sin(1.57+time*1.34+sample*5*(1+sin(time)));
wave_0_per_point2=y=sample+0.1*cos(1.57+time*1.34+sample*5*(1+sin(time)));
wave_0_per_point3=r=0.5+0.5*sin(time+sample*3);
wave_0_per_point4=g=0.5+0.5*sin(time*1.13+sample*3);
wave_0_per_point5=b=0.5+0.5*sin(time*0.97+sample*3);
wave_0_per_point6=
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_1_bUseDots=0
wavecode_1_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_1_bAdditive=0
wavecode_1_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_1_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_1_r=1.000
wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=1.000
wave_1_per_point1=x=sample+0.4*sin(time*(1+sample));
wave_1_per_point2=y=1-(sample+0.4*cos(time*(1+sample)));
wave_1_per_point3=r=0.5+0.5*sin(time+sample*3);
wave_1_per_point4=g=0.5+0.5*sin(time*1.13+sample*3);
wave_1_per_point5=b=0.5+0.5*sin(time*0.97+sample*3);
wave_1_per_point6=
wavecode_2_enabled=0
wavecode_2_samples=512
wavecode_2_sep=0
wavecode_2_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_2_bUseDots=0
wavecode_2_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_2_bAdditive=0
wavecode_2_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_2_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_2_r=1.000
wavecode_2_g=1.000
wavecode_2_b=1.000
wavecode_2_a=1.000
wave_2_per_point1=x=1-(sample+0.1*sin(1.57+time*1.34+sample*5*(1+sin(time))));
wave_2_per_point2=y=sample+0.1*cos(1.57+time*1.34+sample*5*(1+sin(time)));
wave_2_per_point3=r=0.5+0.5*sin(time+sample*3);
wave_2_per_point4=g=0.5+0.5*sin(time*1.13+sample*3);
wave_2_per_point5=b=0.5+0.5*sin(time*0.97+sample*3);
wave_2_per_point6=
wavecode_3_enabled=1
wavecode_3_samples=512
wavecode_3_sep=0
wavecode_3_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_3_bUseDots=0
wavecode_3_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_3_bAdditive=0
wavecode_3_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_3_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_3_r=1.000
wavecode_3_g=1.000
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=1.000
wave_3_per_point1=x=1-(sample+0.4*sin(time*(1+sample)));
wave_3_per_point2=y=1-(sample+0.4*cos(time*(1+sample)));
wave_3_per_point3=r=0.5+0.5*sin(time+sample*3);
wave_3_per_point4=g=0.5+0.5*sin(time*1.13+sample*3);
wave_3_per_point5=b=0.5+0.5*sin(time*0.97+sample*3);
wave_3_per_point6=
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=4
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=0

shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_0_g=0.000

shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.100

shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0

shapecode_1_num_inst=1

shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=0.10000
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.000
shapecode_1_g2=1.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp=0;
per_frame_2=old_bass_flop=bass_flop;
per_frame_3=old_treb_flop=treb_flop;
per_frame_4=old_mid_flop=mid_flop;
per_frame_5=chaos=.9+.1*sin(pulse);
per_frame_6=entropy=if(bnot(entropy),2,if(equal(pulse,-20),1+int(rand(3)),entropy));
per_frame_7=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*chaos+1.3);
per_frame_8=bass_flop=abs(bass_flop-equal(bass_thresh,2));
per_frame_9=treb_thresh=above(treb_att,treb_thresh)*2 + (1-above(treb_att,treb_thresh))*((treb_thresh-1.3)*chaos+1.3);
per_frame_10=treb_flop=abs(treb_flop-equal(treb_thresh,2));
per_frame_11=mid_thresh=above(mid_att,mid_thresh)*2 + (1-above(mid_att,mid_thresh))*((mid_thresh-1.3)*chaos+1.3);
per_frame_12=mid_flop=abs(mid_flop-equal(mid_thresh,2));
per_frame_13=bass_changed=bnot(equal(old_bass_flop,bass_flop));
per_frame_14=mid_changed=bnot(equal(old_mid_flop,mid_flop));
per_frame_15=treb_changed=bnot(equal(old_treb_flop,treb_flop));
per_frame_16=bass_residual = bass_changed*sin(time*(3-bass_thresh)) + bnot(bass_changed)*bass_residual;
per_frame_17=treb_residual = treb_changed*sin(time*(3-treb_thresh)) + bnot(treb_changed)*treb_residual;
per_frame_18=mid_residual = mid_changed*sin(time*(3-mid_thresh)) + bnot(mid_changed)*mid_residual;
per_frame_19=pulse=if(above(abs(pulse),20),-20,pulse+.04*entropy*bor(bor(bass_changed*bnot(treb_changed),treb_changed*bnot(bass_changed))*bnot(mid_changed),mid_changed)+(mid+bass+treb)*.025);
per_frame_20=q1=mid_residual;
per_frame_21=q2=bass_residual;
per_frame_22=q3=treb_residual;
per_frame_23=q4=sin(pulse);
per_frame_24=q5=cos(pulse);
per_frame_25=wave_r=wave_r+.5*bass_residual;
per_frame_26=wave_r=wave_g+.5*mid_residual;
per_frame_27=wave_r=wave_b+.5*treb_residual;
per_frame_28=wave_mystery=wave_mystery+.23*mid_residual;
per_frame_29=ob_r=if(bass_flop,treb_flop,wave_r);
per_frame_30=ob_b=if(treb_flop,mid_flop,wave_b);
per_frame_31=ob_g=if(mid_flop,bass_flop,wave_g);
per_frame_32=ob_a=.03+.02*wave_r;
per_frame_33=ob_size=.05+.04*wave_b;
per_frame_34=ib_r=if(bass_flop,ob_b,ob_g);
per_frame_35=ib_b=if(treb_flop,ob_g,ob_r);
per_frame_36=ib_g=if(mid_flop,ob_r,ob_b);
per_frame_37=ib_a=.03+.02*wave_g;
per_frame_38=ib_size=.05+.04*ob_g;
per_frame_39=zoom=zoom+.08*mid_residual;
per_pixel_1=rot=if(above(q1,0),.4*sin(rad+q3+q4),.4*sin(rad+q2+q5));
per_pixel_2=zoom=zoom-rot/10;
per_pixel_3=cx=cx+.3*sin(x*7*q4);
per_pixel_4=cy=cy+.3*cos(y*5*q5);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`float2 pixelsize = texsize.zw;
warp_4=`float2 uvm = uv;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float2 noise_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_7=`float4 noiseVal = tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, noise_uv);
warp_8=`noiseVal-=roam_sin*roam_cos.wzyx;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`ret.xyz = saturate(tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uvm).xyz*float3(1,1,1) - float3(.0,.0,.0));
warp_11=`ret.xyz = tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uvm).xyz;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float3 rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.xy-.5)*12*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_15=`if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_16=`ret.xy = rsamp.xy;
warp_17=`}
warp_18=`
warp_19=`rsamp = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uvm + (noiseVal.zw-.5)*48*pixelsize).xyz;
warp_20=`if (length(ret.xy - uvm) > length(rsamp.xy - uvm)) {
warp_21=`ret.xy = rsamp.xy;
warp_22=`}
warp_23=`
warp_24=`ret.z = tex2D(sampler_fw_main,ret.xy).z;
warp_25=`
warp_26=`ret.z -= q1*.005;
warp_27=`
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv2;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_6=`c-=roam_sin.wzyx*roam_cos;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_9=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_10=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_11=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_14=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_15=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_16=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_17=`
comp_18=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_19=`
comp_20=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_21=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_22=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_23=`    ret -= 1.3;
comp_24=`    ret += lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur3(uv)*1.75),pow(hue_shader.zxy,ret));
comp_25=`    ret *= ret;
comp_26=`
comp_27=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_28=`}
